      static Graph MyFile.createDirectedGraph(java.lang.String filename)
      open the file, read , and create a Graph;

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.Integer ShortestPath.calcPathDistance(Graph G, java.lang.String word1, java.lang.String word2)
      calculate all distance from node word1 to word2 without path.
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> ShortestPath.calcShortestPath(Graph G, java.lang.String word1, java.lang.String word2)
      calculate all shortest path from node word1 to word2.

      Clear the graph and the path, the start node will be regenerate randomly.

      static void ShowGraph.showDirectedGraph(Graph G)
